issue.title: [CI] Update the conda docker images to use miniforge instead of miniconda
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10245](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10245). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
So we could support more architectures https://github.com/conda-forge/miniforge

cc `[~uwe]`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10245?focusedCommentId=17211045) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
This adds ppc64le, aarch64 and osx-arm64 as supported architectures but should only be a different download URL. Be aware that miniforge doesn't include defaults as a default channel as well that it is unavailable for Windows.
